items.text: I post on social media at least 3 times per week
items.why: Consistent posting keeps you top-of-mind. Most customers check social media before calling.

items.text: I respond to every Google review within 48 hours
items.why: Responding shows you care. It also improves your local SEO ranking.

items.text: I have at least 25 Google reviews
items.why: More reviews = more trust = more calls. Businesses with 25+ reviews get 2x more leads.

items.text: My Google Business Profile is 100% filled out with photos
items.why: Complete profiles get 7x more clicks. Add services, hours, photos, and posts.

items.text: I take before/after photos of every job
items.why: Visual proof is your best marketing. One great before/after can generate thousands in leads.

items.text: I collect customer emails and send updates at least monthly
items.why: Email has 40x the ROI of social media. Past customers are your easiest sales.

items.text: I run seasonal promotions (spring, fall, holidays)
items.why: Seasonal offers create urgency and fill slow periods.

items.text: I post video content (job walkthroughs, tips, behind-the-scenes)
items.why: Video gets 3x more engagement than photos. YouTube is the #2 search engine.

items.text: I respond to new leads within 1 hour
items.why: Leads are 7x more likely to book if you respond within an hour. After 24 hours, you've lost them.

items.text: I follow up on every quote that doesn't book within 48 hours
items.why: 80% of sales happen after 5+ follow-ups. Most contractors give up after 1.

items.text: I use a CRM or system to track leads and customers
items.why: If leads live in your head or scattered notes, you're losing money.

items.text: I send professional-looking quotes (not just texts or verbal)
items.why: Professional quotes get taken seriously and justify higher prices.

items.text: I actively ask for referrals after every job
items.why: Referred customers close 4x faster and spend more. But you have to ask.

items.text: I reach out to old leads who never booked (every few months)
items.why: Timing wasn't right before. A simple 'still need help?' message wins back 10-20% of cold leads.

items.text: Customers can book appointments online (without calling)
items.why: 40% of bookings happen after hours. If they can't book at 10pm, they'll call someone else.

items.text: I send digital invoices with online payment options
items.why: Digital invoices get paid 2x faster. Payment links reduce 'check is in the mail' excuses.

items.text: I send automated appointment reminders (text or email)
items.why: Reminders reduce no-shows by 50%. One text saves you a wasted trip.

items.text: I track actual costs vs estimates on each job
items.why: If you don't know your true costs, you're guessing on pricing. Data = profit.

items.text: I use written contracts or agreements for jobs over $500
items.why: Contracts protect you from scope creep and non-payment. Peace of mind.

items.text: I track all business expenses for tax purposes
items.why: Most contractors miss $5-10k in deductions. Every receipt matters.

items.text: I document every job with photos and notes
items.why: Documentation protects you legally and helps with warranty claims.

items.text: I track equipment maintenance and service schedules
items.why: Preventive maintenance costs 5x less than emergency repairs. Track hours, not just miles.

items.text: I plan efficient routes when doing multiple jobs per day
items.why: Bad routing burns fuel and time. Even basic optimization saves 20%+ on drive time.

items.text: I track supplies/materials and reorder before running out
items.why: Running out mid-job kills productivity. Simple tracking prevents emergency supply runs.

items.text: I have documented processes for common tasks
items.why: SOPs let you hire help without starting from scratch. Your business runs without you.

items.text: I send booking confirmations immediately after scheduling
items.why: Confirmation = commitment. It reduces cancellations and no-shows.

items.text: I text customers when I'm on my way
items.why: 'On my way' texts show professionalism and let customers prepare.

items.text: I send a summary after completing each job
items.why: A completion summary with photos justifies your price and sets up the review ask.

items.text: I ask for Google reviews within 24 hours of job completion
items.why: Ask when they're happiest. Automated requests 10x your review collection rate.

items.text: I have a process for handling complaints professionally
items.why: One handled complaint creates more loyalty than no complaint at all.

items.text: I reach out to past customers for repeat/maintenance work
items.why: Repeat customers cost 5x less to acquire. A simple 'time for your annual service?' works.

items.text: I have AI or a service answering calls I miss
items.why: Missed calls = missed money. AI can answer 24/7, qualify leads, and book appointments.

items.text: My website has a chatbot that can answer questions and book jobs
items.why: 50% of website visitors leave without contacting you. Chatbots capture those leads.

items.text: Customers can send photos for quick estimates
items.why: Photo quotes qualify leads faster. AI can help estimate from images.

items.text: I monitor competitor reviews and pricing
items.why: Know what customers say about competitors. Spot opportunities they're missing.

items.text: I use AI to plan and create content weeks in advance
items.why: Batching content saves hours. AI generates a month of posts in 30 minutes.
